General.Name: Baroyeca Gold & Silver Inc
General.Description: Baroyeca Gold & Silver Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties. The company explores for silver, gold, and copper deposits. Its flagship property is the Atocha Silver-Gold Project comprising 2,585.94 hectares located in Colombia. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 409 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1T2

1.Name: Mr. Raul  Sanabria M.Sc., P.Geo, P.Geo.
